definition: to lose sth abstract but important (courage, authority, one's life etc)/to be bereaved of (one's spouse etc)/to die/disappointed/discouraged
parent/one's own (flesh and blood)/relative/related/marriage/bride/close/intimate/in person/first-hand/in favor of/pro-/to kiss/(Internet slang) dear

sentences.english: One of his jobs is to visit schools and teach about bereavement.
sentences.chinese: 他的工作之一是拜訪學校，講授有關喪親的內容。
